Code.Code: NorthrendLog(Colors.LightGreen, "We're a Mage! Teleporting to Dalaran.");
NorthrendLog(Colors.LightGreen, "Hearthing would be faster to reach our destination, attempting to Hearth!");
NorthrendLog(Colors.LightGreen, "We're in northen Eastern Kingdoms. Using the Orb of Translocation to enter Undercity.");
NorthrendLog(Colors.LightGreen, "We're in Isle of Quel'Danas, using the Flight Master to Stormwind.");
NorthrendLog(Colors.LightGreen, "We're in Pandaria, using the Shrine portal to Dalaran.");
NorthrendLog(Colors.LightGreen, "We're in Outlands, using the Shattrath portal to Orgrimmar.");
NorthrendLog(Colors.LightGreen, "We're in Draenor, using the Ashran portal to Orgrimmar.");
NorthrendLog(Colors.LightGreen, "We're in Deepholm, using the portal for Orgrimmar.");
NorthrendLog(Colors.LightGreen, "We're in Eastern Kingdoms, using the Undercity Zeppelin to Howling Fjord.");
NorthrendLog(Colors.LightGreen, "We're in Eastern Kingdoms, going to Booty Bay to take the boat to Ratchet.");
NorthrendLog(Colors.LightGreen, "We're in Kalimdor, using the Orgrimmar Zeppelin to Howling Fjord.");
